p: To evaluate the inhibitory activity of compound #7 against different HIV genotypes, we used clinical virus isolates representing the two HIV-types, i.e. HIV-type 1 and HIV-type 2. In addition, HIV-type 1 virus isolates were examined from two groups, i.e. the major group M (HIV-1M MVP899-87), and the outlier group O (HIV-1O MVP5180-91). Antiviral activities were evaluated in primary human HIV-1 target cells, i.e. PBMCs. As shown in Fig. 5, compound #7 inhibited replication of all clinical isolates with efficacies similar or even higher than against the prototypical laboratory HIV-1 isolate (HIV-1 LAI, Table 1).
